title: Pine Nut and Fruit Ice Cream Sundaes
directions: Put 1 scoop of ice cream into each of 4 deep bowls; place bowls in freezer. Melt butter in heavy medium skillet over low heat. Add sugar and stir until blended. Increase heat to medium. Add plums and cinnamon and sauté until plums begin to soften, about 3 minutes. Add bananas and sauté just until heated through, about 2 minutes. Spoon sauce over ice cream. Sprinkle with nuts.
ingredients: 1/4 cup firmly packed golden brown sugar
2 ripe but firm bananas, peeled, thinly sliced
